feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:52 PM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 18 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 60%
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then partly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill near minus 23. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 13. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 13. Forecast issued 11:30 AM NST Saturday 24 December 2022
